column4: is there a way to do a text install on the ppc livecd rather than the install via expresso? the help at boot up does not list a text install being available..
is there a way to do a text install on the livecd rather than the install via expresso? the help at boot up does not list a text install being available.
I'm not sure. In all cases you can use the alternate CD.. text based install.
